# Divine Life by VastuCart
# https://vastucart.in

> Free, accurate calculators for Life Path Number, Kundli, Numerology, and Vastu Shastra. Trusted by millions for spiritual guidance.

## About
Divine Life offers free online tools for numerology, astrology, and Vastu Shastra calculations. All tools are available in English and Hindi.

## Available Tools

### Numerology
- Life Path Number Calculator: Discover your life purpose through your birth date
- Name Numerology: Analyze the numerological value of names using Chaldean system
- Destiny Number Calculator: Calculate your destiny number from your full name
- Lo Shu Grid Analysis: Ancient Chinese numerology grid analysis
- Lucky Mobile Number: Find numerologically compatible phone numbers
- Lucky Bank Account Number: Analyze bank account numbers
- House Number Numerology: Check the energy of your home address
- Business Name Numerology: Evaluate business names for success
- Love Compatibility: Check numerological compatibility between partners
- Chaldean Numerology: Deep dive into Chaldean number meanings
- Child Name Suggestions: Get name suggestions based on numerology

### Astrology
- Kundli Generator: Create detailed birth charts (Janam Kundli)
- Lagna Calculator: Calculate your ascendant sign
- Career Predictor: Astrological career guidance
- Gemstone Recommender: Get gemstone suggestions based on your chart
- Kalsarp Dosha Checker: Check for Kalsarp Yoga in your horoscope
- Bhagyodaya Year Calculator: Find your lucky years

## Languages
- English (en)
- Hindi (hi)

## Contact
Website: https://vastucart.in
About: https://vastucart.in/about

## Technical
- Built with Next.js
- Hosted on Vercel
- Available 24/7
